snippet: Juande Ramos's second spell as Malaga coach seemingly ended on Thursday after the club's owner wrote what appeared to be a farewell message to the former Real Madrid, Sevilla and Tottenham Hotspur manager on Twitter....
lead_paragraph: Juande Ramos's second spell as Malaga coach seemingly ended on Thursday after the club's owner wrote what appeared to be a farewell message to the former Real Madrid, Sevilla and Tottenham Hotspur manager on Twitter.

headline.main: Malaga Owner Says Farewell to Coach Ramos
headline.print_headline: Malaga Owner Says Farewell to Coach Ramos
